summary: Slick NPC Overhaul is a Mod created to recreate all the main NPC\'s in the game to make their faces more appealing and badass!
descriptionHtml:
[size=20]About[/size]
Slick NPC Overhaul is a Mod created to recreate all the main NPC\'s in the game to make their faces more appealing and badass!

[color=red]Future Updates[/color]
- More slick NPC\'s
- New followers
- NPC\'s added to the marriage faction



[color=Cyan][size=5]SNO - Complete Edition[/size][/color]
The Complete Edition incorporates every SNO pack to date!


[color=Cyan][size=4]SNO - College of Winterhold_V1[/size][/color] ------- Is here!
Just like always this new SNO mod will change the NPC face models with more attractive and badass ones! This pack aims to make all the witches and wizards in the college really feel magical! 

[color=red]SNO\'D NPC\'s[/color]
- Ancano
- Anriel Gane
- Brelyna Maryon
- Colette Marence
- Drevis Neloren
- Enthir
- Faralda
- Jzargo
- Mirabelle Ervine
- Nirya
- Onmund
- Phinis Gestor
- Savos Aren
- Sergius Turrianus
- Tolfdir
- Urag Gro-Shub


[color=Cyan][size=4]SNO - Companions Guild_V2[/size][/color] ------- Updated!
V2 is now available! Release of SNO I have recreated all the NPC\'s within Jorrvaskr! Including The Circle, Members, Blacksmith and the Servants. Not only do they have a new face they also have new armor. I did this to make the Companions Guild really seem like a group of warriors! For example Athis now has Elven armor instead of Hide armor. Also now all the members within the circle (Werewolf Members) have Wolf armor equipped.

[color=red]SNO\'D NPC\'s[/color]
- Aela The Huntress
- Athis
- Brill
- Eorlund Gray Mane
- Farkas
- Njada Stonearm
- Ria
- Skjor
- Tilma
- Torvar
- Vignar Gray Mane
- Vilkas

[color=red]New Changes[/color]
- Aela new face model (more incidental to the original)
- Njada new face model 



[color=Cyan][size=4]SNO - Dark Brotherhood_V1[/size][/color] ------- Is here!
Now the Dark Brotherhood has a whole new look! Every one including the Spectral Assassin has been SNO\'D! Note that this is V1 of this pack so more will be added and changed in the near future!

[color=red]SNO\'D NPC\'s[/color]
- Arnjorn
- Astrid
- Cicero
- Spectral Assassin
- Festus Krex
- Gabriella
- Nazir
- Veezara

Video --------- Coming Soon!
author: MrBoxer42
